name: Lockable Chest
description:
[h1][b][u]Lockable Chest[/u][/b][/h1]

[b]Mod id: 1814013543[/b] 

Adds a version of the "Large Chest" that is protected by a password.

[h1][b][u]Admin Config[/u][/b][/h1]
Admins can reset a chests password to 0000 from the interaction menu (E)

[h1][b][u]Features:[/u][/b][/h1]
[list]
[*]Requires password to open.
[*]Requires password to dismantle.
[*]Requires password to return to inventory.
[*]Password can by changed from the interaction menu (E)
[/list]

[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198035045999/myworkshopfiles/]Hade's Other Mod's Can be Found by Clicking Here![/url][/b]

updated to latest game cersion.
fix for "Set Password" dialogue occasionally showing instead of the "Enter Password" dialogue.
author: hades aka EZee_AP
